thread.title: Sloane Stephens Breaks Out of Her Slump With a Win in Miami

author: Tom Perrotta
title: Sloane Stephens Breaks Out of Her Slump With a Win in Miami
text:
After a miserable and puzzling slump, American tennis star Sloane Stephens looks like herself again—especially when playing in finals.
Stephens, 25 years old, won the Miami Open on Saturday, 7-6(5), 6-1 against Jelena Ostapenko. This was the sixth final of Stephens’s career and she has yet to lose one of them, including the best of them all, last year’s U.S. Open. Stephens explained her strategy for Saturday: Make Ostapenko hit as much as possible.
